casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Willie James WILDER, Jr. No. 503P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 16, 2005. Amanda P. Little, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of September 2005 by Defendant to be allowed to withdraw petition for discretionary review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of September 2005."
